com.serotonin.bacnet4j.npdu

Class NPCI

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.serotonin.bacnet4j.npdu.NPCI

  • public class NPCI
extends java.lang.Object
    Network layer protocol control information. This class currently only implements the reading of information.
    Author:
    mlohbihler
